document_data.name: Shadow shield
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shadow shield''''' was a powerful [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created a temporary cloak of shadow for the caster. The cloak protected the caster from damage, [[necromancy|necromantic]] spells, negative energy and death-based magic.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
